metadata.feature_description: Search wiki articles and display filtered lists with pagination

steps.expected: Wiki module list view is displayed
steps.actual: Wiki module list view displayed with 6 articles

steps.action: Enter 'technology' in the global search box and submit
steps.expected: Search results page shows matching articles
steps.actual: Search Results page displayed with 'Test Article for Search' containing technology keyword

steps.action: Click on 'wiki' tag link on an article
steps.expected: Article list filters to show only articles with 'wiki' tag
steps.actual: URL changed to include tags=wiki parameter, list filtered to 1 article with wiki tag

steps.expected: Article list filters to show only articles created by current user
steps.actual: URL changed to category=myarticles, list shows 7 articles created by SuperUser Account

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki page with category=draftonly parameter
steps.actual: List shows 1 draft article ('New Test Article')

steps.action: View All Articles list (6 articles total)
steps.expected: Pagination shows Page 1 of 2 with page navigation
steps.actual: Pagination displays 'Page 1 of 2' with links to page 1 and 2

steps.expected: Second page of articles is displayed
steps.actual: Page 2 shows 'Test Article for Metadata' as the remaining article, pagination shows 'Page 2 of 2'

steps.action: Select 'Sort by title' from the sort dropdown
steps.expected: Articles are sorted alphabetically by title
steps.actual: URL changed to sort=title, articles displayed in alphabetical order: Test Article Draft, Test Article for Bookmarks, etc.

steps.action: Filter by tag containing special characters (test@tag#1)
steps.expected: Articles with the special character tag are displayed
steps.actual: Tag 'test@tag#1' with @ and # characters is properly URL-encoded, filter shows 'Test Article for Tagging'

steps.expected: No articles found message is displayed
steps.actual: System displays '0 Articles' and 'No articles were found' message

observations: The 'DraftOnly' filter option is only available in mobile view via dropdown selector, not visible as a tab in desktop view
Desktop view has 'All Articles' and 'My Articles' tabs only; DraftOnly requires URL parameter or mobile view
Tag filtering uses URL parameter 'tags=' which properly URL-encodes special characters
The Wiki list has two rendering modes: static HTML (shows 0 Articles) and knockout.js dynamic view (shows actual articles)
Sort options available: Sort by last active, Sort by created, Sort by title, Sort by views
